p: It has been reported that ginsenoside inhibits activity of AChE and BchE in cultured PC12 cell line resulting in increased amount of ACh content ( 153). In parallel, it restores choline acetyltransferase activity in an animal model of AD ( 154). It also shows neuroprotective ability where it suppresses the glutamate-induced toxicity in AD ( 155, 156).Â
